menu.title: Menu
menu.description: At the left side there is the menu with categorized buttons. Each category page open has their own set of tools.

ui.title: U.I.
ui.description: You can hide subcategories. For example, click on the header 'Instructions' up there to hide this section.
ui.description2: Subcategories status are automatically saved. Next time you visit them, they will still be hidden.

access.title: Access
access.description: This window can be opened in three different ways. At the bottom taskbar button, at the top in debug tools (if that mod is active), and with a keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Shift+C.
access.description2: You can hide or show those button through the U.I. category. The shortcut can be changed in the game 'Settings' > 'Controls' > 'Menu' > 'Creative Mode'.
access.description3: Buttons preferences are saved. Next time you run the game it should still be the same as before.

time.title: Time
time.description: Set the current time of the day.

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: Change the weather. Click twice to skip the slow transition.

difficulty.title: Difficulty
difficulty.description: This will only change the enemies difficult level, not their original spawning rules. (e.g. changing to peacefull will not stop them from spawning)

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Set Mind, Body and Spirit of the selected citizen.

add.title: Add Citizen
add.description: Spawn a new citizen from the selected kingdom.

add_npc.title: Add NPC
add_npc.description: Spawn a new npc from the selected npc kingdom.

turn_into_citizen.title: Turn into a Citizen
turn_into_citizen.description: Make the select entity into a proper citizen of your town. Useful for NPCs or mobs.

teleport.title: Teleport
teleport.description: Allows you to pick a new place for the selected entity.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Offset the entity, visually only. E.g. if you offset it up in the air, the game will still consider it on the ground, at its real location.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Change its voxels size. 1 is equal to a full block, most entities starts at 0.1.

rotate.title: Rotate
rotate.description: Spin it into a new direction.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Add gold to your town. Use negative numbers to remove gold.

trader.title: Traders
trader.description: Calls a random trader to your town.

traveler.title: Travelers
traveler.description: Calls a traveler to your town.

levelup.title: Level up
levelup.description: Raise all jobs to max level.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Set which buttons will stay visible. If none is visible, you will only be able to open it through the keyboard shortcut, Ctrl+Shift+C

contrast.title: Camera Contrast
contrast.description: Set the contrast/saturation of the game image

layer.title: Snow Layer
layer.description: Set the amount of snow covering the world

layer.title: Trees Layer
layer.description: Temporarily hide trees and other natural entities
